Hydras:

Hydras laughted "If I destroy Autobots... the Maximals won't 
exist... But"said seriuosly" Megatron... One of two bots who fusion 
to create me, it's there... I should be very caution If I don't like 
erase myself at the same time... Noooo"hissed the male "I should be 
sure that anything happen to my old form"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 2/16/03 11:51:53 PM Central Standard Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "Not yet"replied Hydras while he walked towaRDS Maxima"When I 
found 
> > the Ark... I'll destroy Maximals FOREVER"
> > 
> 
> Her optics watched him, carefully thought. "JUST the Maximals? Or 
dare you 
> try to destroy the offline Autobots as well?" 
> 
> She had every intention to gain that old style form of her's & go 
to the 2 
> crash sites. The Ark in particular due to the fact... Megatron was 
there. She 
> would give her very existance for him. 
> 
> Going to the crashed Decepticon ship would mean leading the others 
to the 
> Heart of Cybertron. 
> 
> Her optics turned back to the map, a barely seeable smirk upon her 
feline 
> face. "How very interesting." clasping her clawed hands behind 
her, as she 
> studied the map. Her optics seemed to be upon the place where the 
Ark 
> crashed.
